CHAT.comment: ARTHUR S. LUJAN, LABOR COMMISSIONER OF CALIFORNIA, ET AL., Petitioners v. G & G FIRE SPRINKLERS, INC.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:01 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS S. KERRIGAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY A. LAMKEN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN A. SEIDEMAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS S. KERRIGAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
